short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A bookmark management system for job-seekers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
jobmark allows you to bookmark, manage and track job posts online.
•  Automatically generated important info about job posts
•  Add comments to and rate job posts to your liking
•  Track the status of your application 
•  Manage and edit bookmarked job posts in an easy to use tabulated format
